EOF

Bash(git merge develop -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge develop into main: transactions module refactoring

- Restructured 39-file transactions module into organized subfolders
- Extracted 3 generic UI components to src/components/shared/
- Consolidated footers into ModalFooter.tsx with role switch pattern
- Clean index.ts exports \(only public API exposed\)
- All critical adjustments verified \(KPI single endpoint, absolute context paths, no shadow math\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
